channel.title: Help iv been trying for 1 day now... please ill pay
channel.description: guys i cant run server like when i click it it comes up and quickly closes and my compiler is fine but when i type run in compiler it says java erro i ened help im soo tired of trying please somone help me please i beg u . :confused: :( :mad:

item.title: Help iv been trying for 1 day now... please ill pay
item.dc:creator: @i_lured_i i lured i
item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

check your Enviromental Variables.

Let me know if you need assistance with that.

EDIT: I have to go eat, here’s a guide i made just incase you need it!
Open My Computer:

Local Disk (C:) < Program Files < Java < (The java you use. [Example:jdk1.6.0_10]) < Bin

Copy what ever is in your adress bar (Example: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin) is mine, Copy and paste that in your “path” in Enviromental Variables.

How do i get to Enviromental Variables?: Open my computer, click on “View System Information”, Click on the “advanced” tab, and at the very bottom should be a tab for changing Enviromental variables!
(THIS IS FOR WINDOWS, NOT SURE IF IT WORKS FOR VISTA ASWELL)

~I Lured I~

Read full topic
item.source: Help iv been trying for 1 day now... please ill pay
